dt: {bc}an extent of space occupied by or sufficient or available for something
{bc}an appropriate or designated position, post, or station

dt.t: in whose {wi}room{/wi} I am now assuming the pen

dt: {bc}a partitioned part of the inside of a building
{bc}such a part used as a lodging
{bc}a suitable or fit occasion or opportunity {bc}{sx|chance||}

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}rūm{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}rūm{/it} room, Latin {it}rur-, rus{/it} open land
shortdef: an extent of space occupied by or sufficient or available for something
an appropriate or designated position, post, or station

dt: {bc}to occupy or share a room especially as a lodger

shortdef: to occupy or share a room especially as a lodger

dt: {bc}lodging and food usually furnished for a set price or as part of wages

shortdef: lodging and food usually furnished for a set price or as part of wages

dt: {bc}service provided to hotel guests in their rooms
{bc}the hotel department responsible for such service

shortdef: service provided to hotel guests in their rooms; also : the hotel department responsible for such service

dt: {bc}opportunity to make changes or to do things differently in order to produce a better result

dt.t: The strict requirements left us very little {it}room for maneuver{/it}.

shortdef: opportunity to make changes or to do things differently in order to produce a better result

dt: {bc}a comfortable temperature that is not too hot or too cold

shortdef: a comfortable temperature that is not too hot or too cold

dt: {bc}the meeting place of a directing group that exercises its authority in an inconspicuous and indirect way

shortdef: a room situated in the rear
the meeting place of a directing group that exercises its authority in an inconspicuous and indirect way

dt: {bc}a large room (as in a restaurant or hotel) suitable for banquets

shortdef: a large room (as in a restaurant or hotel) suitable for banquets

dt: {bc}a one-room apartment serving as both bedroom and living room {bc}{sx|bedsit||}

dt.t: A fairly large {wi}bed-sitting room{/wi} was vacant at No. 23. I took it, and settled down seriously to make my writing pay.

shortdef: a one-room apartment serving as both bedroom and living room : bedsit

dt: {bc}a comfortably furnished hospital room where both labor and delivery take place and in which the baby usually remains during the hospital stay

shortdef: a comfortably furnished hospital room where both labor and delivery take place and in which the baby usually remains during the hospital stay
